definitions.definition: To try to find; to look for; to search for.
To ask for; to solicit; to beseech.
To try to acquire or gain; to strive after; to aim at.
definitions.example: I sought my fortune on the goldfields.

definitions.definition: To go, move, travel (in a given direction).
To try to reach or come to; to go to; to resort to.
definitions.example: When the alarm went off I sought the exit in a panic.
Our company does not seek to limit its employees from using the internet or engaging in social networking.
